entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
